benchmark_details.name: StyleBench
benchmark_details.overview: StyleBench is a comprehensive benchmark for systematically evaluating reasoning styles across diverse tasks and models, assessing five reasoning styles on five tasks using 15 open-source models.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate reasoning strategies in Large Language Models across various tasks and architectures.

data.source: 15 open-source language models spanning major families (LLaMA, Qwen, Mistral, Gemma, GPT-OSS, Phi, and DeepSeek) with various scales (270M to 120B parameters).

methodology.calculation: Aggregate performance scores computed based on model outputs comparing to ground truth.
methodology.interpretation: Accuracy indicates the proportion of correct responses given by the model across diverse tasks.
methodology.validation: Extensive evaluation across varying model scales and reasoning tasks.
